description: a(n) = numerator of phi(n)/(n+1), where phi(n) is Euler's phi, A000010.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b060473.txt", n, " ", numerator(eulerphi(n)/(n + 1))); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 05 2009
author: _Fabian Rothelius_, Mar 16 2001
extensions: More terms from Asher Natan Auel (auela(AT)reed.edu), Mar 16 2001
